columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the instance group.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The identifier of the instance group.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the instance group.

columns.name: cluster_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the cluster.

columns.name: instance_group_type
columns.description: The type of the instance group. Valid values are MASTER, CORE or TASK.

columns.name: instance_type
columns.description: The EC2 instance type for all instances in the instance group.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The current state of the instance group.

columns.name: bid_price
columns.description: The maximum price you are willing to pay for Spot Instances. If specified, indicates that the instance group uses Spot Instances.

columns.name: configurations_version
columns.description: The version number of the requested configuration specification for this instance group.

columns.name: ebs_optimized
columns.description: Indicates whether the instance group is EBS-optimized, or not.  An Amazon EBS-optimized instance uses an optimized configuration stack and provides additional, dedicated capacity for Amazon EBS I/O.

columns.name: last_successfully_applied_configurations_version
columns.description: The version number of a configuration specification that was successfully applied for an instance group last time.

columns.name: market
columns.description: The marketplace to provision instances for this group. Valid values are ON_DEMAND or SPOT.

columns.name: requested_instance_count
columns.description: The target number of instances for the instance group.

columns.name: running_instance_count
columns.description: The number of instances currently running in this instance group.

columns.name: autoscaling_policy
columns.description: An automatic scaling policy for a core instance group or task instance group in an Amazon EMR cluster.

columns.name: configurations
columns.description: A list of configurations supplied for an EMR cluster instance group. Only availbale for Amazon EMR releases 4.x or later.

columns.name: ebs_block_devices
columns.description: The EBS block devices that are mapped to this instance group.

columns.name: last_successfully_applied_configurations
columns.description: A list of configurations that were successfully applied for an instance group last time.

columns.name: shrink_policy
columns.description: Policy for customizing shrink operations.

columns.name: state_change_reason
columns.description: The status change reason details for the instance group.

columns.name: status_timeline
columns.description: The timeline of the instance group status over time.
